'''Arda Healed''' ([[Quenya|Q.]] ''Arda Envinyanta''<ref>{{MR|P5VII}}, p. 405</ref>) was a new world said in prophecy to come into being after being [[Second Music of the Ainur|sung]] into existence after the [[Dagor Dagorath|Last Battle]]. It would be the renewal of [[Arda Marred]], the fulfilment of a perfected world that would have been were it not for the intervention of [[Morgoth]]. The [[Ainulindalë]] says that [[Men]] will sing with the [[Ainur]] in this Second Music, but that [[Ilúvatar]] has not revealed what role, if any, will be played by [[Elves]].
